rainier gte vml -> linedrawn : 1
gte vml linedrawn -> pixellinewidth : 1
vml linedrawn pixellinewidth -> martha : 1
linedrawn pixellinewidth martha -> walking : 1
pixellinewidth martha walking -> fellow : 1
martha walking fellow -> career : 1
walking fellow career -> dieter : 1
fellow career dieter -> and : 1
career dieter and -> best : 1
